author: craigmcc
msg: Allow getApplicationListeners() to be called before the context has been
started, so that context attributes added during the startup (such as the
temporary directory File object for this application) can trigger events

author: craigmcc
msg: Flesh out the implementation of the new methods added to ServletRequest
and HttpServletRequest, and remove use of the (now deprecated) HttpUtils
class from Catalina.  As a side effect of this change, parameter parsing
(particularly when there are parameters present both on the query string
and in the POSTed input data) should run faster.

author: craigmcc
msg: Complete the initial implementation of "Application Lifecycle Events"

author: craigmcc
msg: Add empty methods for the request implementation objects so that Catalina
will compile cleanly against the new API classes.  The functionality of these
methods is yet to be added.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add updated instructions for building Catalina, including the need to
use the "jakarta-servletapi" branch for the new spec versions.
